# Set Up

```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(tidybiology)
data(happy)
data(happy_join_one)
data(happy_full)
```

# Question 1

Take a look at the three data frames:

1.  `happy`
2.  `happy_join_one`
3.  `happy_full`

```{r}
head(happy)
head(happy_join_one)
head(happy_full)
```

# Question 2

Combine `happy` and `happy_join_one` by row.

```{r}
bind_rows(happy, happy_join_one)
```

# Question 3

Combine `happy` and `happy_join_one` by column.

```{r}
bind_cols(happy, happy_join_one)
```
